ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp.Bid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Bid>

    public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Bid>
    Created by Martina on 16-02-29. This class keeps track of all the information relating to a bid and is used by a number of activities (IncomingBids, MyBidsActivity, MakeBidActivity) to display or save information from bids saved to ElasticSearch. BidList, CustomIncomingBidsAdapter and Bid Controller also use class Bid. There's a couple things in here that we've included as comments (startDate and endDate) but weren't able to finish implementing so they've been pushed to Project Part 6 but remain in commented out sections.
    Author:
    Adam, Andrew, Erin, Laura, Martina
    See Also:
    MyItemsActivity, IncomingBidsActivity, ViewBorrowingOutActivity, MyBidsActivity, MakeBidActivity, ElasticSearch, BidList, CustomIncomingBidsAdapter, BidController

        Description copied from interface: java.lang.Comparable

        Parameters:
        another - the object to compare to this instance.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: java.lang.Object
        Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation is equivalent to the following expression:
